title: Film Industry Incentive Scheme now available in Georgia
short_description: From now on international film producers are invited to re-explore Georgia as one of the most favorable filming destinations, since in the frames of the State Program “Produce in Georgia”  the government of Georgia introduced a special film industry incentive, cash rebate scheme, and coupled it with the amazing filming locations that country offers in terms of nature and existing infrastructure.
long_description:
The state programe „Produce in Georgia” was recently expanded to encouraging the film industry development in Georgia, therefore the government offers international and local producers a special 20-25% cash rebate scheme on the qualified expenses incurred in Georgia.

The film production incentive program is implemented by Enterprise Georgia, the body under the Ministry of Economy and Sustainable Development, in cooperation with the Georgian National Film Centre, part of the Ministry of Culture and Monuments protection of Georgia.

Government applies the “One Stop Shop” principle  for the provision of production services to create a favorable environment for producers and remove the bureaucratic obstacles that may occur.

Services on offer include:

  • Inviting producers
  • Location scouting
  • Scheduling
  • Assistance in procurement of permits
  • Coordination & communication with various stakeholders

 

Local and international producers are invited to apply for the new film incentive program and shoot the following products in Georgia:
